About us
The Anti-Red Tape Authority (ARTA) oversees the implementation of R.A. 11032 or the Ease of Doing Business and Efficient Government Service Delivery Act. Talk to us: info@arta.gov.ph

The Anti-Red Tape Authority (ARTA) will hold the first official economic forum headlining Special Assistant to the President for Investment and Economic Affairs (SAPIEA) Secretary Frederick D. Go with the Economic & Ease of Doing Business (EODB) Briefing on 24 January 2024 at Manila Hotel, Manila.
With a theme 'Charting Progress through Strategic Investment and Boosting Economic Opportunities”, the briefing will gather participants from various government offices, diplomatic corps, local and foreign chamber of commerce representatives, business groups, and non-government organizations.
#ARTA #SAPIEA #Economic&EODBBusinessBriefing2024 #BagongPilipinas

𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐝 𝐞𝐁𝐎𝐒𝐒 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧
18 January 2024 - Under President Ferdinand “Bongbong” Marcos Jr.’s whole-of-government approach, the Anti-Red Tape Authority (ARTA), Department of the Interior and Local Government (DILG), Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT), and the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) are hastening the mandatory compliance of all local government units (LGUs) to the establishment of an electronic Business One-Stop Shop (eBOSS).
Section 11(c) of Republic Act (RA) 11032, or the Ease of Doing Business and Efficient Government Service Delivery Act of 2018 mandates LGUs to implement a fully operational eBOSS for a more efficient filing of applications and issuance of local business licenses, permits, clearances, and authorizations three (3) years after the effectivity of the law.
Read more: https://lnkd.in/gCDqYVSB

Learn more about newly-appointed Special Assistant to the President for Investment and Economic Affairs (SAPIEA) Secretary Frederick D. Go's plans and strategies in making the Philippines more business-friendly to local and foreign investors through the Anti-Red Tape Authority (ARTA)-led Economic and Ease of Doing Business (EODB) Briefing on 24 January 2024 at Manila Hotel, City of Manila.
#ARTA #SAPIEA #Economic&EODBBusinessBriefing2024

12 January 2023 | With most enterprises renewing their respective business permits in January, the Anti-Red Tape Authority (ARTA) conducted an on-site inspection in the local government units (LGUs) of Pasig City and Makati City last 08 January 2023.
Headed by ARTA Deputy Director General for Operations Gerald G. Divinagracia and Compliance and Monitoring Evaluation Office (CMEO) Director Grace L. Fernandez, the inspection team examined the application and renewal process of these LGUs. In particular, the team assessed their compliance with requirements on Citizen’s Charter, electronic Business One-Stop Shop (eBOSS) functionalities, and physical BOSS features to ensure a more efficient service delivery.
Republic Act No. 11032 or the Ease of Doing Business Law mandates LGUs to set up their most current Citizen’s Charters and establish their respective eBOSS. To help them achieve full compliance with this law, the ARTA team also presented their findings to the LGUs, zooming in on the required actions and recommendations.
#ARTA #eBOSS
